page.title: 06Cheney Manor Road.
page.content: Cheney Manor Road, which runs from North to South of this area is an arterial link road between the centre of Swindon and the outer estates.A survey conducted between 08.30 and 09.00 recorded 341 cars going into town and 131 car going out. Some factories on the trading estate close at lunch time on Fridays and a survey between 13.30 and 14.00 recorded 225 cars and 76 other vehicles going into town and 250 cars and over 100 other vehicles leaving town.Two pelican crossings are provided for pedestrians. A{Pelican Crossing}is made to help everybody cross the road safely,especially old people and mothers who have prams and pushchairs.You press the button and it will say "wait".When the red man changes to green and you hear a bleeping noise you may cross the road.
